name: Favo – Woocommerce Product Favorite
author: Arif Rohman Hakim

sections.description:
Favo is light product favorite/wishlist for woocommerce

Features :

  • Fast
  • Easy to use

Plugin Demo
You can try the plugin on this url: http://arifrohmanhakim.com/plugins/favo

  • username: coba
  • password: 123456

Usage Instruction

  1. Install the plugin.
  2. In the Admin Panel, Go to Favo
sections.installation:
1. Grab the plugin from from wordpress plugin directory or Upload the favo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Grab the plugin from from wordpress plugin directory or Upload the favo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin
